definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: Tropical summers of 24hr sunlight are replaced by freezing winters of continuous night.
sentences.chinese: 到了冬季，夏季不斷的酷熱被連續的夜間嚴寒所代。

sentences.english: Scorching temperatures don't give you license to bare your midriff, flash cleavage, or wear short shorts.
sentences.chinese: 酷熱的天氣沒有給你袒胸露乳，穿短褲上班的權利。

sentences.english: The heat was unbearable, as it usually was. I was carrying two half-liter bottles of water, one in each hand.
sentences.chinese: 和往常一樣，酷熱難擋，我一手拿着一瓶水。

sentences.english: He often work in a swelter.
Kudzu root soup is used to prevent heat stroke and influencer in summer time, when temperature is very high.
sentences.chinese: 酷熱天氣下，飲用粉葛湯可預防中暑以及感冒。

sentences.english: This should be hot in the summer, now why can let a person feel so cool?
sentences.chinese: 本應酷熱的盛夏，此刻爲何會讓人感覺如此的微涼？

sentences.english: It is too warm this gloaming so that he suddenly feels eager to jump into the water.
sentences.chinese: 黃昏的天氣格外酷熱，他突然想跳進水裏涼爽一下。

sentences.english: In baking summer even a fan can help a lot.
sentences.chinese: 正在酷熱的夏天一把紙扇也很有作用。

sentences.english: Many workers became tired and weak in the heat.
sentences.chinese: 很多工人都不堪酷熱變得疲倦虛弱。

sentences.english: A female ferret will die if it goes into heat and cannot find a mate.
sentences.chinese: 雌白釉在酷熱的環境下如果找不到配偶就會死亡。

sentences.english: SUMMERS in Tokyo are renowned for their diabolical heat.
sentences.chinese: 東京的夏季因其酷熱而聞名。

sentences.english: It is too warm this gloaming so that he feels eager to jump into the water.
sentences.chinese: 黃昏的天氣酷熱，他想跳進水裏涼爽一下。

sentences.english: This plant requires a positioned in full sun, flourishing in a hot dry location.
sentences.chinese: 性喜陽，需要全光照，在乾燥及酷熱的地方生長良好。

sentences.english: Extreme heat sees temperatures reaching the low 40s Celsius in southern England.
sentences.chinese: 酷熱將讓英格蘭南部的氣溫達到40多攝氏度。

sentences.english: Hot weather, even the airport would have been intolerable heat.
sentences.chinese: 酷熱的天氣，連機場也會感到暑熱難耐。

sentences.english: It's a good place for spending hot summer days.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個度過酷熱暑假的好地方。

definition: (of the sun) to scorch/to expose to a scorching sun
